Title: Rediscovering Singapore
Paragraphs: In December 2020, vouchers worth $100 each were distributed to Singaporeans to help boost the country’s tourism industry, hit hard by the Covid-19 pandemic. Four months later, however, only a quarter have used these vouchers on local attractions, tours, and hotels. The end-June deadline to redeem these tokens is fast approaching, so we wondered, what’s with the low uptake?
Author: Faizal Kamal
